Our Products

We specializes in providing various types of high-vacuum butterfly valves, high-vacuum ball valves, ultra-high vacuum plug valves, high-vacuum diaphragm valves, high-vacuum gate valves, electromagnetic vacuum valves, and other valve products.  Our main products adopt international advanced technology and incorporate advanced quality control systems. They are characterized by advanced product structure, reliable durability, and superior performance.
